articles.title: Paleontological Mystery: New Study Reveals That Ammonoids Thrived Until Their Sudden Extinction - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A recent study utilized museum collections to chart global ammonite diversity prior to their complete extinction. The findings reveal that ammonites were not declining before they perished alongside non-avian dinosaurs 66 million years ago. A new study publis…
articles.content: A new study challenges the view that ammonoids were declining before their extinction 66 million years ago, showing instead that they remained diverse and robust globally. This research highlights th… [+5523 chars]
